titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3717) to increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-436, by Mrs. Myrick.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Energy and Commerce now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 153.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 554.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/11/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3717) to increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.
